text:
Mohammad-Reza Rahchamani (‎; 1 December 1952 – 9 March 2020) was an Iranian physician and reformist politician. From 1984 to 2000, he represented Sabzevar in the Iranian Parliament. During the early 2000s, he headed Iran's State Welfare Organization. Rahchamani was born in Sabzevar, Iran.
Rahchamani died as a result of the coronavirus on 9 March 2020 in Tehran, aged 67.
